casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Jarvis D. BROADNAX. No. 293P07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 23, 2007. John G. Barnwell, Assistant Attorney General, Belinda J. Foster, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 25th day of June 2007 by Defendant for Petition for Discretionary Review Under G.S. 7A-31(c)(1) & (2):

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 23rd day of August 2007."
